trans-unit.source: Provides an abstract base class for a script control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma classe base abstrata para um controle de script.

trans-unit.source: ScriptControl inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> class and implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IScriptControl> interface.
trans-unit.target: ScriptControl herda o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>classe e implemente o <xref:System.Web.UI.IScriptControl>interface.</xref:System.Web.UI.IScriptControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> class is a base class for ASP.NET Web server controls.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>classe é uma classe base para controles de servidor Web do ASP.NET.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>

trans-unit.source: The ScriptControl is an abstract class, which you cannot instantiate directly.
trans-unit.target: O ScriptControl é uma classe abstrata, você não pode instanciar diretamente.

trans-unit.source: Instead, you derive a class based on this abstract class.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, você derivar uma classe com base em sua classe abstrata.

trans-unit.source: The ScriptControl base class tests the page for a <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control during the `PreRender` stage of the derived control.
trans-unit.target: A classe base ScriptControl testa a página de um <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>controlar durante o `PreRender` estágio do controle derivado.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: The ScriptControl base class also makes sure that the derived control calls methods of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control to register script during the `Render` event.
trans-unit.target: A classe base ScriptControl também garante que o controle derivado chama métodos do <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>controle para registrar o script durante o `Render` evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: This includes registering <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor> objects for the ScriptControl when the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptControl.Render%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Isso inclui registrando <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor>objetos para o ScriptControl quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptControl.Render%2A>método é chamado.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptControl.Render%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptControl.Render%2A> method makes sure that <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor> objects are not rendered unless the ScriptControl itself is rendered.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptControl.Render%2A>método garante que <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor>objetos não são renderizados a menos que o ScriptControl em si é processada.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptControl.Render%2A>

trans-unit.source: This enables a ScriptControl to work inside a closed <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Isso permite que um ScriptControl trabalhar dentro de um fechado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: You can add as many descriptors and types as necessary to any class that you derive from ScriptControl.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar quantos descritores e tipos conforme necessário para qualquer classe que deriva de ScriptControl.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptControl"></xref> class in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptControl"> </xref> classe em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"></xref> objects for the control.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, retorna o <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"> </xref> objetos para o controle.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>coleção de <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"> </xref> objetos.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns the script files for the control.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, retorna os arquivos de script para o controle.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> collection that contains ECMAScript (JavaScript) files that have been registered as embedded resources.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>recursos incorporados de coleção que contém os arquivos de ECMAScript (JavaScript) que foram registrados como.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender*> event and registers the script control with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender*>evento e registra o script controlar com o <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"> </xref> controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender*>

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> event of the base class is raised, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A> method registers the script control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Após o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>da classe base é gerado, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A>método registra o controle de script com o <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>objeto que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render*> event and sends server control content to a provided <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object, which writes the content to be rendered to the browser.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render*>eventos e envia conteúdo de controle de servidor a um fornecido <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> objeto, que grava o conteúdo a ser renderizado no navegador.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object that receives the server control content.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> objeto que recebe o conteúdo do controle de servidor.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, registers the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"></xref> objects for the control.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, registra o <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"> </xref> objetos para o controle.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>coleção de <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"> </xref> objetos.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, registers script files for the control.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, registra os arquivos de script para o controle.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> collection that contains ECMAScript (JavaScript) files that have been registered as embedded resources.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>recursos incorporados de coleção que contém os arquivos de ECMAScript (JavaScript) que foram registrados como.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>
